Introduction to Bird Calling If you wish to attract more birds to your Acme Bird Feeder, learn the art of bird calling. Bird calling is an efficient way to alert more birds to the presence of your bird feeder.

Bird calling requires learning:

  • Popular and classical bird songs
  • How to whistle like a bird
